caption:
Greedy tip system:
‘First tip’ is $4 mandatory, ok…
‘Second tip’ presented as 20%, but is 35% of the original charge (Or ‘only’ 30% if you calculate over the mandatory tip)🚫

@toasttab need to learn basic math, 
or recalibrate their greed.

#tips #psa #greedytech 
#robotsforhumans 🤖 
#synthiaforever
